#### Notice Type and Method

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Notice Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Procurement Category

CNST

#### Procurement Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites consulting firms with Heavy Civil Engineering expertise to submit proposals for Standing Offers. The selected consultants shall provide a range of services as identified in the Required Services section of this document for building projects in the Western Region, excluding Comprehensive Land Claim Areas, Nunavut, and Northwest Territories.

#### Delivery Regions

*   Saskatchewan
*   Alberta
*   Manitoba

#### Trade Agreements and Agreements

This solicitation is open to participants who can demonstrate their ability to comply with the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and  the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

#### Contracting Entity and Contact

The Contracting Entity is:
> Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
> Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,Gatineau,Quebec,K1A 0S5,Canada
> Contact: Christopher Lau, christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
